name: Proliferating Spores
title: Spore Dust Cloud
desc: Few can safely traverse the traps laid by the Fungus with intelligence above that of the average living being.
inPlayDescription: Your Jadeplume Terrorshroom, who has this card equipped, can accumulate 1 more stack of Radical Vitality.

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against Jadeplume Terrorshroom at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When your active character is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Jadeplume Terrorshroom, equip this card.After Jadeplume Terrorshroom equips this card, immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Volatile Spore Cloud once.Your Jadeplume Terrorshroom, who has this card equipped, can accumulate 1 more stack of Radical Vitality.(You must have Jadeplume Terrorshroom in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
